title: Must Watch: Behind the Scenes of Danny MacAskillâ€™s Slabs
content:
Unless you’ve been living under a rock (or slab, perhaps) you’ll have seen Danny MacAskill’s latest film: The Slabs, shot on the Dubh Slabs on Danny’s home patch, the Isle of Skye. Now, the team behind it, We are Peny, give us an insight into how it was filmed, including a couple of sketchy incidents […]

The post Must Watch: Behind the Scenes of Danny MacAskill’s Slabs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
